attributes.action: SCRAP the Bournemouth Borough Council & Manchester City Council Bills as they will harm genuine pedlars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of stopping genuine pedlars trading in the streets is wrong. The Pedlars Acts are our cultural inheritance and should be protected.  I enjoy cultural diversity in our community. Like musicians, pedlars bring something different & entertaining to the streets. 
The Bills are unfair. 
Please Prime Minister forget about harming this pedlar by back door legislation and concentrate on keeping our street culture dynamic and alive. 
I endorse this pedlar's activities.
